snippet: The party said the former editor, Zhao Xinyu, had been expelled for openly discussing party policy and for corruption.
abstract: Zhao Xinyu, former editor of Chinese newspaper Xinjiang Daily, is ousted from Communist Party for openly discussing party policy and for corruption; attac

byline.contributor: Mia Li and Vanessa Piao contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The party said the former editor, Zhao Xinyu, had been expelled for openly discussing party policy and for corruption.

headline.main: Former Editor of Xinjiang Newspaper in China Is Ousted From Communist Party
headline.print_headline: Chinese Editor, Purged for Discussing Policy, Is Expected to Face Graft Charges
